entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to a few rain showers near noon and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
